name: Trace
tagline: Workflow Automations for the Human ðŸ‘¾ AI Workforce
description: A workflow automation platform that routes tasks to the right agent â€“ human or AI. By connecting tools like Slack, Jira and Notion â€“ Trace breaks down existing workflows, spots automation opportunities and embeds AI agents to repetitive tasks.

name: Qoder
tagline: Qoder is an agentic IDE for real software development.
description: Qoder transforms how AI understands real software. Beyond snippets, it grasps your entire architectureâ€”dependencies, patterns, history. Chat naturally for multi-file edits or delegate tasks to AI. From invisible complexity to transparent collaboration.

name: TraceRoot.AI
tagline: Fix bugs faster with open source, AI native observability
description: Traceroot is an AI-native, open-source observability tool that connects logs, traces, metrics, code, and team discussions. It doesnâ€™t just summarize issues â€” it helps fix them by creating GitHub issues and PRs in a developer-friendly workflow.

name: Onlook for Web
tagline: Open source Cursor for designers
description: End the design-dev handoff nightmare. Onlook is an Open Source builder that helps product teams ship faster by building production-ready apps visually. Use code as the source of truth â€“ zero translation errors, instant collaboration across all roles

name: AI Elements by Vercel
tagline: The shadcn/ui component library for building AI-native apps
description: AI Elements is an open source library of customizable React components for building interfaces with the Vercel AI SDK. Built on shadcn/ui, it provides full control over UI primitives like message threads, input boxes, reasoning panels, and response actions.

name: Tab With a View 2.0
tagline: Open a tab, escape somewhere beautiful
description: Free browser extension that turns every new tab into a mini-vacation â€” stunning views, calming city walks & Pomodoro focus. Loved by 10,000+ Chrome & Edge users escaping the ordinary every day.

name: Re:Connect
tagline: Speak with Your Eyes No Special Hardware Needed
description: Revolutionary webcam-based eye-tracking technology that turns any laptop into a powerful text dictation tool. No expensive hardware required.

name: Command A Reasoning
tagline: Enterprise-grade control for AI agents
description: Command A Reasoning by Cohere is an advanced model for enterprise reasoning tasks. Designed for private deployment, it outperforms models like gpt-oss-120b while running on a single H100. A user-controlled token budget lets you balance performance and cost.

name: Walk the World
tagline: Transform your daily steps into satisfying map milestones
description: Have you walked enough this week to finish the Boston marathon? Find out with Walk the World, an addictively healthy new take on step-tracking. It converts your daily steps into iconic map milestones, with souvenirs to collect along the way.

name: Sprout Track
tagline: A web-based baby activity app with seamless family sharing
description: The Beta Launch! Baby tracking that works for your whole family. Track feeding, sleep, diapers & milestones from any browser. Share access instantly with caregivers via ID/PIN - no downloads or accounts required. Built by parents for parents.

name: Revyu.AI - Smart Hotel Booking
tagline: Find, review and book hotels like you own them!
description: Stop endless scrolling: Text search with AI - get personalized results list - see real analysis - Book with Confidence! With Revyu.AI Chrome extension you can search with simple text, summarize hotel reviews and get answers to your questions. Get it for free!

name: Rexpt - AI Receptionist Service
tagline: Never Miss a Call, Never Miss a Client with Agentic AI App
description: Rexpt, Smart AI Receptionist to handle all your Business front desk utilizing Artificial Intelligence. Rexpt handles your business calls 24/7, Nurture Leads, Take Calendar Bookings, Fight Spam Calls, Take Notes & Provide Worry-Free Front-Desk Management.

name: MentorCruise
tagline: Connect with the world's greatest mentors
description: Get 1:1 guidance from 6,000+ top experts in Software Engineering, AI, Product Management, Design, and Business â€“ only on MentorCruise.

name: AI User
tagline: AI users that test your app and automate QA
description: AI User tests all your critical user flows autonomously. It turns a prompt into a test case and also self-heals when the UI changes. Put your QA on autopilot and slash test maintenance, let AI User handle it.

name: Promptmonitor
tagline: Get your brand mentioned in AI (ChatGPT, Perplexity + more)
description: Promptmonitor helps you track and improve your company's visibility across ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and other AI/LLMs. Get mentioned in AI with Promptmonitor.

name: Octayne PSA
tagline: Time, Expense and Invoice Automation for Consulting Firms
description: Octayne PSA is a professional services automation platform that offers unified solutions for time tracking, expense management, and automated invoicing with AI speed and precision.

name: Rag Document Viewer
tagline: Highâ€‘Fidelity Document Viewer for RAG Apps
description: RAG Document Viewer is an open-source library that generates high-fidelity file previews for seamless integration into your applications. It provides desktop-level file viewing capabilities for a wide range of document formats

name: Hedge UI
tagline: React starter kit for trading applications
description: Launch your trading application fast with Hedge UI, a React starter kit for building high-quality, customisable trading apps.

name: AI Help Documentation Generator
tagline: Create help docs from screenshot | free tool
description: AI-powered documentation generator that transforms screenshots into comprehensive help docs. Generate user guides from screenshots with our automated help documentation tool. Create professional documentation instantly.
